channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report E-2025050540
item.description:
Report E-2025050540

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-09
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO ENTERPRISE SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 11:09 ET, XPO-UBI reported two releases of 18-0-6, Ornamental Herbicide and Amercoat 370 which released from one 25-pound plastic bag and one 4-gallon poly pail to trailer floors due to a improper packaging and failure to report a spill by a previous terminal. Terminal personnel had already cleaned and containerized the spilled product before contacting the call center. (2) 20 gal / (1)â€“30-gal poly drums.
